attributes.action: Disallow objections to existing Sports/Leisure facilities/events from perons moving into areas   AFTER the event/Facility already exists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a person/persons or organisation decide to move into a home or other facility knowing that sporting/leisure activities ALREADY take place in that area then they should have NO legal right to object to those activities (assuming that said activities do not in themselves break the law/s.)
